REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0337 reute d f BC-EASTERN-<EML>-ACQUIRE 03-04 0039

TEXT.TITLE: EASTERN <EML> ACQUIRES EMHART <EMH> PRODUCT LINE
TEXT.BODY: Eastern Co said it purchased the tooling, equipment and inventory used to produce the Corbin Cabinet Lock product line from Emhart Corp for undisclosed terms. Reuter
